issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
The bug is present in Titanium SDK 3.4.0 and 3.3.0.

Bug could not be reproduced with Titanium SDK 3.2.3.

How to reproduce:

create new application using TitaniumStudio.
File -> new -> Mobile App Project
click 'Run application on device'
Rapidly click android back button when app starts (splash screen is being displayed) 


Expected result: 
Application exits correctly

Actual result:
Application crashes.
fields.summary: Application crashes when back button is pressed during splash screen opening.
fields.environment:
Mac OS X: 10.9.4
Titanium Studio: 3.4.0
Titanium SDK: 3.4.0
Device: Nexus 5: 4.4.2

comments.body:
I am facing same issue.
Titanium SDK is : 3.5.0.

Did you find any solution?
Nope, there is no solution AFAIK

Hello, This is not a issue anymore in the latest release, SDK 4.1.0.GA. Please upgrade your SDK. The application exits in to the background as expected. Thanks. 

Test Environment

SDK 4.1.0.GA
CLI 4.1.2
Android Device Explorer ZV, 4.4.2, Nexus 7, 5.1.0
